1.0.0.desc:
Wow, I am glad to introduce osumer version 1.0.0 snapshot version here! In this version, updater things are mainly focused.

Change-log: 
- Added osumer-updater to handle all installations and updates
- Added change-log viewer
- Added support for in-app updating

Known bugs:
- The application cannot be uninstalled if launched via osumer-updater

1.0.1.desc:
This version made minor changes to the updater system.

- Fixes invalid change-log
- Let install/uninstallation things to be done with the standalone using arugments instead of using osumer-updater

Unfortunately, the following bug still cannot be fixed:

- The application cannot be uninstalled if launched via osumer-updater

1.0.2.desc:
Minor bugs fixes after 1.0.1

- Fixes "This is an old version" typo
- Fixes change-log viewer to not be editable

Unfortunately, the following bug still cannot be fixed:

- The application cannot be uninstalled if launched via osumer-updater

1.0.3.desc:
This will (might) be the last release of 1.x.x series and I will start developing 2.x.x series.
Further releases of 1.x.x are just bugs fixes without major features additions.
A month later without bugs, this release will be promoted to stable.

In this version, minor bugs are fixed

- Fixed crashing download when the beatmap name contains special characters (not supported in Windows)
- Fixed AlwaysOnTop with download dialog

This bug still exists, and probably won't be fixed if I don't have time:

- Cannot uninstall osumer if launched from osumer-updater (File in use problem, we have to get another process to remove osumer.exe)

1.0.4.desc:
This will (might) be the last release of 1.x.x series and I will start developing 2.x.x series.
Further releases of 1.x.x are just bugs fixes without major features additions.
A month later without bugs, this release will be promoted to stable.

Minor bugs fixes, but it seems to major bugs fixes if the user has an space in their names. (e.g. Maria John)

- Fixes installer to decode URL of running file path
- Code optimizations
- Copyright optimizations

This bug still not fixed

- Cannot uninstall osumer if launched from osumer-updater. You just need to use a external osumer (not from Program Files) to uninstall and everything is okay!

1.0.5.desc:
This will (might) be the last release of 1.x.x series and I will start developing 2.x.x series.
Further releases of 1.x.x are just bugs fixes without major features additions.
A month later without bugs, this release will be promoted to stable.

Major bug fixes in this version.

- Fixes download crashes in beatmaps name with special characters that are not supported in Windows
- Blocks uninstallation if launched in Program Files

This bug still not fixed

- Cannot uninstall osumer if launched from osumer-updater. You just need to use a external osumer (not from Program Files) to uninstall and everything is okay!

1.0.6.desc:
Ready for osumer2 update! osumer2 is going to be distributed on Late October!

This will (might) be the last release of 1.x.x series and I will start developing 2.x.x series.
Further releases of 1.x.x are just bugs fixes without major features additions.
A month later without bugs, this release will be promoted to stable.

Bug fix(es):

- Fixes osu! account unable to login bug
    - osu! forum login is now redirected to ```index.php?success=xyzabc``` instead of just ```index.php```

This bug still not fixed

- Cannot uninstall osumer if launched from osumer-updater. You just need to use a external osumer (not from Program Files) to uninstall and everything is okay!

2.0.0.desc:
This is a experimental release of osumer2. There might be bugs in it, but it should work properly. Please do not hesitate reporting those bugs.

- Added queuing
- Added background downloading
- Added background download sound
- Added osumer2 daemon
- Added beatmap searching and managing
- Added more customizable preferences
- Added better updater algorithm

Some features such as beatmap managing, Plugins, Security and Getting Started are not implemented. These will be added in further builds.
Tutorials can be found at "https://github.com/mob41/osumer/wiki/osumer-tutorial". It is still building though.

Thank you for your support in osumer. Put a star to this project would help me to continue developing in it!

This is a experimental release of osumer2. There might be bugs in it, but it should work properly. Please do not hesitate reporting those bugs.

- Fixed bug pro-longed idle -> auto logged out.
    - check logged in status and re-login if logged out
- UI invalid WARNING of no osu! account
- Reject new beatmap web links (e.g. "https://osu.ppy.sh/b/1483372"
    - more than 6 digits beatmap links are rejected
    - TODO: Implement new webpage links parsing

Some features such as beatmap managing, Plugins, Security and Getting Started are not implemented. These will be added in further builds.
Tutorials can be found at "https://github.com/mob41/osumer/wiki/osumer-tutorial" It is still building though.

This is a experimental release of osumer2. There might be bugs in it, but it should work properly. Please do not hesitate reporting those bugs.

- Fixed unwanted "You must be logged in..." dialog when searching beatmaps (Issue #8) 

Some features such as beatmap managing, Plugins, Security and Getting Started are not implemented. These will be added in further builds.
Tutorials can be found at "https://github.com/mob41/osumer/wiki/osumer-tutorial" It is still building though.

!!! This is a must to update to this version. This version contains code to temporarily solve the osu!-web new site problems. !!!

This is a experimental release of osumer2. There might be bugs in it, but it should work properly. Please do not hesitate reporting those bugs.

- Includes legacy old-site redirecting/parsing

Some features such as beatmap managing, Plugins, Security and Getting Started are not implemented. These will be added in further builds.

Tutorials can be found at "https://github.com/mob41/osumer/wiki/osumer-tutorial" It is still building though.
